text:
doctypes.xmap patch fixes the problem of getting 404 for pages that aren't a
part of the template pub.

usecase-bxe.xmap and usecase.xmap patches fix the problem of not being able to
edit with bxe in a pub using a pub template.
creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu

applied, thanks. i had to manually apply the patch because the offsets were
wrong. please always do svn up before you diff to make sure it applies cleanly
